text: Bircham International University is an educational institution of higher education. It uses distance education. It offers adult degree programs. It is registered in Spain and Delaware. In the past it operated from the Bahamas or the United Kingdom. It has no recognized educational accreditation in any of these places. (list is no longer being maintained) It is a member of the European Foundation for Quality in eLearning.EFQUEL members, European Foundation for Quality in eLearning website, accessed June 27, 2010 It is also a member of the International Accreditation and Recognition Council,International Accreditation & Recognition Council website an unrecognized accreditation agency in the United States. Bircham states that it was accredited by the American Association for Higher Education and Accreditation in 2010. This organization is not a recognized accreditation body.Thomas Bartlett, ""Inquiry Into Higher-Education Group Reveals Odd Connections," Chronicle of Higher Education, Monday, August 25, 2008Ezell, Allen (2009), Recent Developments with Degree Mills: Accreditation Mills and Counterfeit Diploma and Transcript Operations , College and University 85(2):40-50. Accessed on website of MACRAO, the Michigan Association of Collegiate Registrars & Admissions Officers, September 12, 2012. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bircham International University official website Category:1992 establishments Category:Colleges and universities
title: Bircham International University
